about_the_game:
Worst World is a Hardcore zombie multiplayer survival game. Survive in a post apocalyptic world, collect resources and set up camps. Make friends or join a micro society of survivors. The World does not give you a gift. No crosshair, menu, life bar. You can be happy to breathe and to have spent the night every day.
In this game you have the posibility to create bases and customize them, steal cars and motorbikes in order to move around the map more quickly. Collect weapons to face the zombies, Collect food, care as well as tools like a pickaxe, an ax is a knife. For example the knife will be very useful to you to recover zombie skins and not to be spotted by them. In addition the game contains a crafting system allowing you to combine objects and obtain new items, Create your own weapons like a bat with a nail! So dreadful ... Beware of illness and cold that can make you fall ill, it's up to you to learn how to cure them or how to slow down certain death.
But above all there is a danger. The others, indeed hunger will push players to kill you for your resources or for the craziest, to devour you.

In the current version (V4), you will be able to find zombies, weapons, the first maps of the game, the first builds, character physics, blood and injuries, weather and seasons as well as the day / night cycle, the inventory and the various loot (clothes, food, tools, weapons ect). The animation system (to make emotes), cars and motorcycles, and of course the possibility of joining you online via discord or steam ! You can now explore the casing, find resources, invite your friends, and survive several nights with luck! The latest update added the much anticipated quality change system which allowed access to weaker computer configuration!

So good luck and try to support you instead of fighting you.

content_descriptors.notes: the game has a low-poly and stylized aspect but it retains a violent aspect in the blood and ragdoll of the players. blood is not carried but is present. No nudity is observable only the player can be found in underwear, when the girls will have a minimum tee shirt
